Name: Supply Jobs Australia
Overview:
As a procurement professional I found myself frustrated with the current job boards available.

Searching resulted in a handful of supply chain related role and a lot of 'general results'. Alternatively I could insert my keywords and use a number of tricky drop downs before searching to refine my search.

If I wanted to narrow my search down to particular companies, the search became even more troublesome. I also couldn’t guarantee that all the supply chain roles were listed in the category I'd selected as the company advertising for a procurement role might be advertising in banking!

I could set up job alerts but I then found myself missing out on new job postings because what I would consider a “contracts specialist” might be called a contract engineer or contracts advisor somewhere else. If I wanted to be more vague my inbox was being bombarded with random ‘specialist’ roles that had nothing to do with procurement whatsoever.

What I needed was a job board that specialised in supply chain jobs and nothing else. I needed a job board that I could quickly browse without having to try a thousand different search terms. I needed a job board that would show me every supply chain role currently listed in a major city just by selecting the name of that city. I needed a job board that would show me a list of companies advertising supply chain roles so I could just click on the name of the company that interested me to list all the procurement jobs currently being advertised by that company.

Unfortunately this job board didn’t exist so like any tenacious supply chain person, I went about building my own!

The result is supplyjobs.com.au. We are now the largest job board for supply chain professionals within Australia. We are passionate about making our website the most user friendly resource for supply chain professionals available and hope to make your job searching experience a more user friendly and pleasurable one.

Welcome to supplyjobs.com.au!

Name: Construct Recruitment
Overview:
In 2000, Construct was started by 2 construction professionals who were sick and tired of years of being oversold and under-delivered construction personnel from all of the labour-hire and recruitment firms.

The UK office was reinforced with construction workers (rather than salespeople), who were equally annoyed at being treated like a number whilst working for the existing labour-hire firms and wanted to be part of a company that could make a real difference to workers and clients alike.

Construct has an unrivalled workforce of the most highly qualified and skilled personnel. This enables us to offer continuous and quality work as well as developing teams which further excel as experienced units.

After thousands of requests from previous workers, Construct expanded into Australia in 2011. By employing highly skilled social media strategists, we look forward to building the same happy and productive workforces that have had such a positive impact for workers and clients alike in the UK.

Client-centric: Throughout the search, we partner with you to better understand your organisation and the context of the appointment. We strive to create long lasting relationships with clients and candidates that deliver real value.

Location: PO Box 687, West Perth, Western Australia 6872, AU
Overview:
Since 1969, the name BSP has been synonymous with the provision of high quality technical personnel in the resource industry. A WA-owned technical employment agency, BSP has been supplying engineering, technical and industrial staff to major Australian and International companies. From temporary hire to permanent placements, from mechanical and geotechnical to the civil and construction industries, BSP prides itself in finding the right people for the right job!

The title BSP originates from an engineering and drafting company established in London in 1941 by Messrs Bayley, Smith and Pettinger who later branched out to Australia with offices in Melbourne and Sydney in 1958. The BSP Industries office in Western Australia was established in 1969 and subsequently transferred to local ownership in 1981.

In 2011 BSP changed its name to BSP Technical Recruitment to better represent the aims in its business plans.

For further information on vacancies or what we can offer, please don't hesitate to contact any of our lovely representatives.

Vantage over the years has been a diversified Recruitment Specialist and a leader in the Australian market providing both Permanent Recruitment and Contract Resourcing services across a range of industries.

We believe in value creation through the connection of great people, connecting together those who have the ability to deliver exceptional outcomes through the application of information, communication and technology. Name: Jon Michel Executive Search
Overview:
Jon Michel Executive Search (JMES) was established in 1997 to provide search and selection services to the financial, professional services and corporate sectors.

The firm's clients include commercial banks, investment banks, fund managers, insurance companies, private equity and venture capital houses, stockbrokers, consulting firms, professional practices as well as a select group of blue-chip corporates.
